0000_000_000_000_001     // format for R OPCODE_RS_RT_RD_FUNC RD = RS + RT 
0100_000_000_000100     //  ADDI_RS_RT_IMMD  RT = RS + IMMD
0010_000_000_000_000    // OUT R-Ins OUT_RS_Don't Care
0000_001_001_001_001
0100_001_001_000010
0000_000_001_001_011
0010_001_000_000_000    // out R1 
0000_010_010_010_001
0101_010_010_001111  // ANDI 
0010_010_000_000000 // out R2
0000_011_011_011_001
0110_011_011_000111  // ORI
0010_011_000_000000 // out R3
0000_100_100_100_001
0100_100_100_011111 // 
1000_000_100_000000 // SW R4 into ADD = R0
0010_100_000_000000 // out R4
0000_101_101_101_001
0111_101_000_000000 // LW R5 from ADD = R0
0101_101_101_001100
0010_101_000_000000 // out R5
